content: That's really helpful! I think I'll try styling the scene with a more rustic, countryside feel for my lavender and lemon candles. I attended the Artisan Market at the local library on April 10th, and I got some great feedback on my candles, so I'm excited to create a new line that will appeal to customers. Do you have any tips on how to price my candles? I want to make sure I'm pricing them competitively.
